description: No-3-in-line problem for equilateral triangle array of side n.
references: Mohammad K. Azarian, A Trigonometric Characterization of  Equilateral Triangle, Problem 336, Mathematics and Computer Education, Vol. 31, No. 1, Winter 1997, p. 96.  Solution published in Vol. 32, No. 1, Winter 1998, pp. 84-85.

Mohammad K. Azarian, Equating Distances and Altitude in an Equilateral Triangle, Problem 316, Mathematics and Computer Education, Vol. 28, No. 3, Fall 1994, p. 337.  Solution published in Vol. 29, No. 3, Fall 1995, pp. 324-325.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Mira Bernstein_
